Text: Hi, does this have both endings or just the alternate?  Cheers!
I deleted the 6-channel track but it still won't work on my 360. First time I've had that problem.

Audio and video quality is superb on this one! In a comparison with this file and the official Blu-Ray disc on a 50" screen, aside from being just slightly darker in the nighttime scenes, there is almost no discernable difference. Thanks a bunch!
